languages.text: "Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр четко, по уставу приветствует вас, не забывая, впрочем, осмотреть с ног до головы своим "сканирующим" взглядом.{/n}
"Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр четко, по уставу приветствует вас, не забывая, впрочем, осмотреть с ног до головы своим "сканирующим" взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy, but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinizing gaze.{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德以惯常的礼节向你问好，但用审视的目光将你从头到脚扫视了一遍。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德以惯常的礼节向你问好，但用审视的目光将你从头到脚扫视了一遍。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard te saluda con su habitual cortesía, pero se asegura de estudiarte de la cabeza a los pies.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard te saluda con su habitual cortesía, pero se asegura de estudiarte de la cabeza a los pies.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドは馴染んだ身振りで礼儀正しく挨拶するが、その視線は綿密にあなたに向けられていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドは馴染んだ身振りで礼儀正しく挨拶するが、その視線は綿密にあなたに向けられていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard grüßt dich mit der gewohnten Höflichkeit, mustert dich jedoch mit seinem prüfenden Blick von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard grüßt dich mit der gewohnten Höflichkeit, mustert dich jedoch mit seinem prüfenden Blick von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Abélard vous salue avec sa courtoisie habituelle, mais prend soin de vous examiner de pied en cap avec son regard scrutateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Abélard vous salue avec sa courtoisie habituelle, mais prend soin de vous examiner de pied en cap avec son regard scrutateur.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan." {n}Abelard, alışılmış kibarlığıyla seni selamlasa da yeren bakışlarıyla seni baştan aşağı süzmeyi ihmal etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain." {n}Abelard greets you with customary courtesy but makes sure to scan you from head to toe with his scrutinising gaze.{/n}
